casebody.data:
WILLIAMS
v.
INSURANCE COMPANY. No. 712PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 23, 2006. George L. Simpson, III, Raleigh, for Nationwide Mutual Ins. Co. Thomas J. White, III, Kinston, Gregory E. Floyd, for Debbie & Ashley Williams. Roger A. Askew, Jodee S. Larcade, Raleigh, for NC Asso. of Defense Attorneys.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of May 2006 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Debbie & Ashley Williams) shall have up to and including the 7th day of July 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of May 2006."
